name: Truth Seeker
entries: At 6th level, you gain spells that help you access deeply guarded secrets and long forgotten lore. You learn the zone of truth and speak with dead spells which donâ€™t count against your known spells and you can cast each once per day without expending a spell slot.
In addition when you grant a creature that is charmed or frightened your Bardic Inspiration they may immediately remake the saving throw against the effect if applicable.
